user_query: I want to access historical price data for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Ripple, and the current exchange rate from USD to EUR.

TaskList.description: Fetch historical price data for Bitcoin in USD for the past 7 days.
Fetch historical price data for Ethereum in USD for the past 7 days.
Fetch historical price data for Ripple in USD for the past 7 days.
Fetch the current exchange rate from USD to EUR.
